think_procedure: 1. Identify the purpose of the 'wal_buffers' knob in PostgreSQL. 2. Determine if it has any special values that break the natural order (e.g., -1 or 0). 3. Assess the behavior of 'wal_buffers' when set to these special values versus regular numerical values. 4. Conclude whether 'wal_buffers' can be classified as a special knob based on the findings.
